item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, May 15, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Slovak premier Robert Fico critically injured in assassination attempt
2. Citi executive responsible for implementing thousands of job cuts quits
3. OpenAI co-founder and chief scientist Ilya Sutskever departs
4. New visa rules force HSBC and Deloitte to withdraw UK job offers
5. Slower pace of US inflation sends Wall Street stocks to record highs
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, May 15, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
